suggestions.original: To improve the line texture in the artwork, consider incorporating more varied and intricate line work. For example, you could add finer details to the hair by using different line thicknesses and directions to create a more realistic texture. Similarly, adding more detailed lines to the clothing, such as folds and patterns, can enhance the depth and interest. For the rainbow, using a mix of smooth and slightly rougher lines can give it a more dynamic appearance. Overall, introducing a greater variety of line textures will add sophistication and visual interest to the piece.
